title: Music Class
class_details: How  to play musical instruments and explore your talent.
experience: 10 years of teaching music to kids.
importance_of_learning: Music fosters creativity, improves memory, and builds discipline, helping kids develop critical skills for future growth.
reviews: My child loves the music class and has learned so much!
Great teacher and a fun environment.

title: Art Class
class_details: Discover the world of colors and creativity.
experience: 8 years of experience in teaching art and design.
importance_of_learning: Art nurtures imagination, enhances problem-solving skills, and boosts emotional expression in children.
reviews: The art projects are so creative and engaging!
Ms. Emily is wonderful and very patient.

title: Yoga Class
class_details: How to yoga for flexibility and mindfulness.
experience: 6 years of yoga teaching experience for kids.
importance_of_learning: Yoga improves physical strength, enhances concentration, and supports mental well-being.
reviews: The yoga sessions have improved my child's focus and balance.
Ms. Sarah makes yoga so much fun for the kids!

title: Dance Class
class_details: Move to the rhythm and learn exciting dance steps.
experience: 12 years of experience in various dance forms.
importance_of_learning: Dance helps children build confidence, improve coordination, and express themselves creatively.
reviews: My daughter looks forward to every dance class!
The choreography is fantastic and age-appropriate.

title: Science Explorers
class_details: Engage in fun experiments and discover science.
experience: 15 years as a science educator and researcher.
importance_of_learning: Science inspires curiosity, enhances critical thinking, and builds a foundation for lifelong learning.
reviews: My son loves the experiments and always talks about them at home!
Dr. Alan makes science exciting and easy to understand

title: Cooking Class
class_details: Learn basic cooking skills and make delicious recipes.
importance_of_learning: Cooking encourages creativity, teaches life skills, and helps develop healthy eating habits.
reviews: The recipes are easy and delicious!
Chef Laura is amazing and inspires my child to cook at home.

title: Sports Club
class_details: Play and improve your skills in various sports.
experience: 15 years as a professional sports coach.
importance_of_learning: Sports foster teamwork, improve physical fitness, and instill a sense of discipline.
reviews: My child loves the variety of sports offered.
Coach David is very supportive and encouraging.

title: Drama Class
class_details: Explore acting and stage performance skills.
experience: 7 years of experience in theater and drama teaching.
importance_of_learning: Drama enhances communication skills, boosts self-confidence, and encourages creativity.
reviews: The drama exercises are so much fun!
Ms. Anna really helps kids come out of their shells.

title: Math Wizards
class_details: Boost your math skills with fun activities.
experience: 9 years of teaching advanced math to kids.
importance_of_learning: Math builds logical reasoning, enhances problem-solving, and lays the groundwork for academic success.
reviews: My son’s math skills have improved tremendously!
The activities are very engaging and educational.

title: Potering
class_details: Learn about plants and grow your own garden.
experience: 5 years of experience in botany and gardening.
importance_of_learning: Potering teaches responsibility, nurtures patience, and encourages a love for nature.
reviews: My son’s potering skills have improved tremendously!
The activities are very engaging, clamming and educational.
